formatted_address: 160 Robinson Rd, #05-01 SBF Center Medical Suites, Singapore 068914
name: The Aesthetics Firm

reviews.text: I recently had a wonderful experience with a HydraFacial treatment here, making it incredibly convenient for professionals in the financial industry nearby. The environment was clean, modern, and inviting, creating a relaxing atmosphere amidst the hustle of the city. Olivia, the specialist who attended to me, was extremely professional and attentive, explaining every step of the process and tailoring the treatment to my skin's needs. I left feeling refreshed, with noticeably brighter and smoother skin. It’s definitely a great spot for busy professionals looking for quality skincare services!

I have my hydro facial and BBL treatment by Olivia, and am very happy  & satisfying with the results. The procedure was quick, comfortable, and Olivia is very detail and professional. After a few treatments, I saw there is great improvement on my complexion, it's clearer and radiant.
Olivia then recommended me to try on fotona treatment, After 1 Session with Dr Stephen, I saw visible result..  highly recommend hydro facial  and BBL as maintenance and fotona laser

I did Picosure treatment at The Aesthetics Firm and can see visible and lasting results after the first few sessions. My therapist Olivia is professional, friendly and makes me feel completely at ease. Dr Stephen is also easy to talk to and takes the time to explain the treatment process and answers all my questions. Glad I found this place and would definitely recommend it to anyone who’s looking for aesthetics treatments…

I recently had a BBL (BroadBand Light) treatment, by Joey, and I couldn't be happier with the results. The procedure was quick, comfortable, and the staff was incredibly professional and knowledgeable. My skin has never looked better—it's clearer, more even-toned, and radiant. The improvement was noticeable after just a few sessions, and the long-term benefits are amazing. I highly recommend BBL for anyone looking to rejuvenate their skin and achieve a youthful glow!

Olivia was very welcoming and hospitable in her services. Docter was patient and address my concerns and gave me a good treatment plan. Will definitely recommend this clinic for anyone who has specific concerns for their skin

vicinity: 160 Robinson Road, #05-01 SBF Center Medical Suites
